setActor.name: Establecer el Actor Persistente
setActor.hint: Establezca el actor del token seleccionado como persistente.

filter.name: Usar Filtro de la Barra Lateral
filter.hint: Permitir filtrar el contenido de la barra lateral actual.

alternate.name: Alternar Controles
alternate.hint: Activa o desactiva los controles del rastreador de combate para mostrar opciones adicionales.

healthStatusMenu.name: Estado de Salud
healthStatusMenu.label: Configurar Estado de Salud
healthStatusMenu.hint: Set up Health Status divisions to display in the HUDs.

enabled.name: Activado
enabled.hint: Habilita este elemento HUD en su cliente.

expand.name: Auto-Expandir al Cargar
expand.hint: Forzar la expansión de la barra lateral de Foundry al cargar la página.

noRollMode.name: Ocultar los Modos de Tirada
noRollMode.hint: Eliminar los botones de Modo de Tirada del chat.

alwaysFilter.name: Filtro de la Barra Lateral Siempre Visible
alwaysFilter.hint: La entrada del filtro de las barras laterales siempre estará visible en lugar de requerir el uso de una combinación de teclas.

highestSpeed.name: Mostrar Velocidad más Alta
highestSpeed.hint: If no speed was manually selected, the highest one will always be shown by default even if the land speed isn't 0.

useModifiers.name: Use Modifiers
useModifiers.hint: Display modifiers instead of the difficulty value in the different HUD elements.

alliance.name: Alliance Button
alliance.hint: Show the alliance/disposition button in the HUD.

autoFill.name: Auto-Fill NPCs
autoFill.hint: If you haven't made any manual changes, the shortcut slots will automatically be filled.

display.name: Display Position
display.hint: Where should the hud be displayed in the  UI.

selection.name: Modo de Selección
selection.hint: Modo de selección para el actor persistente.

shiftEffect.name: Mantener Shift para ver los efectos
shiftEffect.hint: Cuando esté habilitado, debes mantener presionada la tecla 'shift' para interactuar con los íconos de efectos del HUD.

slots.name: Extra Shortcut Slots
slots.hint: Number of extra shortcut slots to add to the HUD.

enabled.hint: Enables this HUD element on your client. This is overridden when the 'Player Access' system worldclock setting is disabled.

activation.name: Modo de Activación
activation.hint: Seleccione el modo para activar el token HUD.

mode.name: Display Mode
mode.hint: Select the mode of display of the token HUD.

delay.name: Tooltip Delay
delay.hint: Delay in milliseconds before the tooltip shows up on screen.

distance.name: Display Distance
distance.hint: Will display the distance between the hovered token and one that is inferred automatically. Note that the module will instead use the scene units if it is anything other than the default value.

draw.name: Draw Distance
draw.hint: Draw a line of this thickness between the hovered token and the 'distance' target.

status.name: Display Health Status
status.hint: Should health state be displayed on the tooltip if enabled in you world.

partyAsObserved.name: Party Alliance as Observed
partyAsObserved.hint: Consider actors in the 'Party' alliance to be observed by players for the sake of showing health details. Not to be confused with the 'Party' actor.

started.name: Only When Started
started.hint: The tracker will only show up for players if the combat has actually started (on top of needing a combatant participating).

textureScaling.name: Texture Scaling
textureScaling.hint: Invert scales the combatant's image based on the token texture scaling.

src.none: Couldn't find a valid image source
src.video: Videos are not supported with this feature

resolve.title: Use Resolve Point
resolve.full: {name} is full of stamina and doesn't need to rest.

breather.label: Take a Breather
breather.hint: Rest for 10 minutes, spend a resolve point and regain all your stamina.

steel.hint: Use an action, spend a resolve point and regain half your stamina.

health-status.title: Health Status

export.title: Export Health Status
export.confirm: Health Status has been copied to clipboard.

health-status.default: Dead, At Death's Door, Not Feeling Good, Seen Better Days, Barely Hurt, Perfectly Fine

pf2e-hud.no-selection: You need to select at least one valid creature.

error.selectOne: Select a single NPC/Character token to set as your persistent actor.

clean.hover: Only show UI when hovering the portrait

setActor.set: Set selected token as persistent actor

drag.exist: This scene already contains a token for this actor.

pan.none: This actor doesn't have any active token on the current scene.

clear.title: Clear Shortcuts
clear.hint: Are you sure you want to delete the following shortcuts?

copy.title: Copy User Shortcuts
copy.hint: Select a user to copy the shortcuts from.
copy.label: User Owner
copy.none: This actor doesn't have any other owner.

fill.title: Auto-Fill Shortcuts
fill.content: Are you sure you want to auto-fill the shortcuts?

pin-token.notify: Select a token to pin as favorite.

error.locked: The Shortcuts are locked with the Hotbar
error.notHUD: You need to drag elements from the HUD itself to create shortcuts.
error.notScript: Only script macros can be added to shortcuts.
error.wrongActor: You can only create shortcuts from the same persistent actor.
error.wrongType: You cannot create a shortcut of that type.

delete.title: Delete Macro
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this macro?

use-resolve.full: {name} is full of stamina and doesn't need to rest.

breather.used: {name} has {ratio} SP and spends a resolve point, taking a 10 minute breather. Stamina Refreshed.
